0010110100100111 0011010110010111 0 -> sum: 0110001010111110, cout: 0
0011000001100110 0011110101001111 0 -> sum: 0110110110110101, cout: 0
1010010011010000 1100011001000111 0 -> sum: 0110101100010111, cout: 1
0101101010010011 1111101001001001 1 -> sum: 0101010011011101, cout: 1
1111110100100101 0000111011010011 0 -> sum: 0000101111111000, cout: 1
0111011111101000 1010000001001011 1 -> sum: 0001100000110100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
